SGF ALN SLO 30 NNE OWB BWG 40 NNE HSV CBM 20 ENE MLU 35 E SHV 35 SSW
TXK 30 W TXK 35 ESE FSM 15 W HRO 45 N SGF.

GEN TSTMS ARE FCST TO THE RIGHT OF A LINE FROM 40 SE MEI 25 W LFT 15
NNW GLS 15 NE NIR 35 E COT 30 SSW HDO 30 NNW HDO 40 N SAT 30 NE AUS
